lines.text: Let's make it fifty.
Make it three yards motherfucker and we'll have an auto-MO-bile race.
Those satisfactions are permanent.
You'd have yourself a real street-sweeper here if you put a little work into it.
I go fast enough.
You can never go fast enough.

[after being approached sexually by a male hitchhiker]
I'm not into that!
I just thought it might relax you while you drive.
This is competition, man. I've got no time.
Performance and image, that's what it's all about.
If I wanted to bother, I could suck you right up my tail pipe.
Sure you could.
You guys aren't like the Zodiac killers or anything, right?
Nope. Just passin' through.
I don't like being crowded by a couple of punk road hogs clear across two states, I don't.
I don't believe I've ever seen you. Course there's lots of cars on the road like yours. They all get to look the same. They perform about the same.
Well, here we are on the road.
Yup, that's where we are all right.
If I'm not grounded pretty soon, I'm gonna go into orbit.
Say, which way we going?
East.
That's cool. I never been East.

[looking at some cassette tapes]
These are groovy records.
Play one.
I don't believe I've seen you. 'Course there's lots o' cars on the road like yours, they all get to lookin' the same. They perform about the same, too...
Everything fell apart on me. My job, my family, everything. I had this job as a television producer and I walked into the office and I...
I don't wanna hear about it.
What do you mean, you don't wanna hear about it?
It's not my problem.
